yeah!! yeah!!
getting it down with
AR Rahman
get it down
get it down
get it down now

Showkali
padam padam
showkadichu
orama nikkaadhudaa

Showkali
vendaam vendaam
ponnugellaam
onnumey illathaanda

showkka ikkidhu machi
sokkaaya maattikittu
sitta kadaththi
vandila vachchi.

Showkali Showkali
Showkali kalli.

eadhu edadhu

showkaali kaattum

veththi vachchi
showkaali naandi.] (2)

namma siragugalae
indha bike-unga thaaney
indha ulagainilae
mudhal thaevayae.

Naan murukka murukka
ena parakka parakka
viduvaayo

kattam vilakka villakka

viduvaayo

kaiyya pudikka
katti anaikka
enakkena oru bike-u
podhum

ena marakka
dhooram kadakka
ennoda bikae podhum
podhumey podhumey

yelae yelae yelae
yelae makkaa
yelae yelae yelae

vandiya paaru machi
ponnunga unga kachchi
naanga ippa
rendu kachchi

yeah yeah yeah
yeah yeah yeah

vandiya ottum podhu
kanavula therivadhu
unakenna

jadhagam paakkumpodhu
vandi undhan kavasam
pinnaadi pogadhada
unakuthaan avasaram

indha .. thaaney

showkali kooda serndha

talk like a king

yeh yeh yeh

chicks we don’t care

nee kulungi nadakkum
azhagu nadaiye….
paarkka vizhigal alla..
un mayakkum mandhira paarvai
pasangalukku urakkam illa..

adhukku mella mella
iduppula madippula

vizhundhiduvaan lesaa..
indrin pudhumai ilamai
ini pudhumai irundhum
un thandhiram mandhiram
vilaiyaadum uraiyaadum

pala murai
oru murai thirumbadi
un munnaadi thallaadi nindru

naan sikkith thikki mukki
un gambeera thotrathil mirandu
